full_summary:
**Supply New Waste Compactors and Installation**
==============================================

**Notice ID:** PW-22-01017579
**Solicitation Number:** 21207-23-4246878

**Notice Status:** Expired

**Trade Agreement:** The solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada's free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, and Panama.

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**End User:** Correctional Service of Canada, Atlantic Institution

**Description:**
The Correctional Service of Canada requires the supply and installation of two (2) new waste compactors, with hydraulic pumps and controls, and one (1) receiver bin at its existing location. The main compactor is past its life cycle and is constantly breaking down. The contractor must also dispose of the current compactor and ensure that the new equipment is commissioned, functioning, and signed off by the Chief, Facilities & Maintenance or Supervisor, Facilities & Maintenance, as per manufacturer specifications, before leaving the site.

**Deliverables:**
The contractor must provide all parts and labor for the installation of both compactors and receiver bin, including freight and disposal fees.

**Contact Information:**
St-Onge, Jason
Contracting Authority
Phone: 506-269-3765
Email: [jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**Attachments:**
The solicitation document and associated documents can be downloaded from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/b6696beb1887948c01b6ddebadfd9dca/rfp_compactor.pdf
